question.altText: HM1A.
question.text: HM1A: Gender of the Householdhead

question.text: HM9: Number of boys aged 3 – 5 years

question.altText: HM10. Jumlah perempuan usia 0-2 tahun
question.text: HM10: Number of girls aged 0 – 2 years

question.altText: HM11. Jumlah laki-laki usia 0-2 tahun
question.text: HM11: Number of boys aged 0 – 2 years

question.altText: HM12. Total jumlah anggota rumah tangga
question.text: HM12: Total number of household members

question.altText: HM13-1. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Tidak Ada Kesulitan Melihat"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM13-1. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty seeing? (No difficulty)

question.altText: HM13-2. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Beberapa Kesulitan Melihat"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM13-2. Because of a health problem or old age ,does anybody in your household have difficulty seeing? (Some Difficulty )

question.altText: HM13-3. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Banyak Kesulitan Melihat"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM13-3. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty seeing? (A lot of difficulty)

question.altText: HM13-4. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Tidak Dapat Melihat Sama Sekali"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM13-4. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty seeing? (Unable to do it)

question.altText: HM14-1. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Tidak Ada Kesulitan Berjalan atau Naik Tangga"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM14- 1. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty walking or climbing steps? (No difficulty)

question.altText: HM14-2. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Beberapa Kesulitan Berjalan atau Naik Tangga"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM14-2. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty walking or climbing steps? (Some dificulty)

question.altText: HM14-3. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Banyak Kesulitan Berjalan atau Naik Tangga"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM14- 3. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty walking or climbing steps? A lot of difficulty)

question.altText: HM14-4. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Tidak Dapat Berjalan atau Naik Tangga Sama Sekali"

help.text: If the respondent says “nobody” but you see somebody who looks like s/he has special needs, probe, ask again.
help.altText: Kalau responden menjawab "Tidak Ada", tapi anda melihat seseorang sepertinya membutuhkan "bantuan khusus", tolong pastikan kembali

question.text: HM14- 4.Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty walking or climbing steps? (Unable to do it)

question.altText: HM15-1. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Tidak Ada Kesulitan Untuk Mengurus Diri Sendiri Seperti Mandi dan Berpakaian"

help.text: When babies and small children cannot walk or care for themselves yet, those of course do not count.
help.altText: Bayi dan anak-anak yang belum bisa berjalan dan belum bisa mengurus dirinya sendiri, tidak dhitung.

question.text: HM15-1. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty with self-care such as washing or dressing? (No dificulty)

question.altText: HM15-2. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Beberapa Kesulitan Untuk Mengurus Diri Sendiri Seperti Mandi dan Berpakaian"

help.text: When babies and small children cannot walk or care for themselves yet, those of course do not count.
help.altText: Bayi dan anak-anak yang belum bisa berjalan dan belum bisa mengurus dirinya sendiri, tidak dhitung.

question.text: HM15-2. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty with self-care such as washing or dressing? (Some difficulty)

question.altText: HM15-3. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Banyak Kesulitan Untuk Mengurus Diri Sendiri Seperti Mandi dan Berpakaian"

help.text: When babies and small children cannot walk or care for themselves yet, those of course do not count.
help.altText: Bayi dan anak-anak yang belum bisa berjalan dan belum bisa mengurus dirinya sendiri, tidak dhitung.

question.text: HM15-3. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty with self-care such as washing or dressing? (A lot of difficulty)

question.altText: HM15-4. Berapa banyak orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kondisi "Tidak Dapat Mengurus Diri Sendiri Seperti Mandi dan Berpakaian Sama Sekali"

help.text: When babies and small children cannot walk or care for themselves yet, those of course do not count.
help.altText: Bayi dan anak-anak yang belum bisa berjalan dan belum bisa mengurus dirinya sendiri, tidak dhitung.

question.text: HM15-4. Because of a health problem or old age, does anybody in your household have difficulty with self-care such as washing or dressing? (unable to do it)

question.altText: HM16. Total jumlah orang di rumah tangga ini dengan kebutuhan khusus

help.text: add all the total number of persons who have a lot of difficulty (3) or are unable to do it (4), and fill in that number here. Of course not counting people twice. Do not use derogatory words to describe a person with special needs.
help.altText: Total semua orang yang memiliki "Banyak Kesulitan", dan "Yang Tidak Bisa Sama Sekali"

question.text: HM16. Total number of people in this household with special needs

question.altText: W01. Apa sumber utama air minum bagi anggota rumah tangga?
question.text: W01. What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household?

question.altText: W02. Apa fasilitas toilet/jamban yang biasa digunakan oleh anggota keluarga?

help.text: Guidance: this is not an observation question. Do not go to the toilet at this point of the survey. The toilet observation questions will follow, in module SAN.
help.altText: Ini bukan pertanyaan pengamatan. Jangan ke toilet saat ini. Pengamatan toilet ada di bagian berikutnya di bagian SANITASI

option.value: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to piped sewer system
option.text: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to piped sewer system
option.altText: Toilet siram, disiram menuju ke sistem saluran pembuangan komunal

option.value: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to septic tank
option.text: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to septic tank
option.altText: Toilet siram, disiram menuju ke septictank

option.value: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to pit latrine
option.text: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to pit latrine
option.altText: Toilet siram, disiram menuju lubang penampung (tidak kedap air)

option.value: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to somewhere else
option.text: Flush or pour flush toilet flush to somewhere else
option.altText: Toilet siram, disiram menuju ke tempat lain

option.value: Flush or pour flush toilet flush, don't know where
option.text: Flush or pour flush toilet flush, don't know where
option.altText: Toilet siram, tidak tahu menuju kemana

question.text: W02. What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use?

question.altText: W03. Apakah punya listrik?
question.text: W03. Do you have electricty?

question.altText: W04. Apakah punya radio
question.text: W04. Do you have radio?

question.altText: W05. Apakah punya televisi
question.text: W05. Do you have television?

question.altText: W06. Apakah punya telepon
question.text: W06. Do you fixed telephone?

question.altText: W07. Apakah punya hand phone?
question.text: W07. Do you have mobile phone?

question.altText: W08.Apakah punya kulkas
question.text: W08. Do you have refrigerator?

question.altText: W09. Apa jenis bahan bakar utama yang biasanya digunakan di rumah anda untuk memasak

help.text: Guidance: Electricity is when it comes from a community energy source (or bigger), eg from a hydro-electric plant, or the mains. A personalised system such as solar panels with a battery is not electricity.

option.altText: TIDAK ADA MAKANAN YANG DIMASAK DI RUMAH

question.text: W09. What type of fuel does your household mainly use for cooking?

question.altText: W10. Apa BAHAN UTAMA LANTAI RUMAH ini?

help.text: W10. ASk and OBSERVE
help.altText: W10. Tanya dan AMATI

question.text: W10. What is the main material of the floor in your household?

question.altText: W11. Berapa luas lantai rumah ini? (dalam meter persegi)

help.text: W11. Ask and observe
help.altText: W11. Tanyakan dan amati

question.text: W11. How big is the house size? (in meter square)

question.altText: W12. Berapa kamar tidur di rumah ini?
question.text: W12. How many bedroom in the house?

question.altText: W13. Apa BAHAN UTAMA ATAP rumah ini?

help.text: W13. Ask and observe
help.altText: Tanya dan amati

question.text: W13. What is the main material for the roof of the house?

question.altText: W14. Apa BAHAN UTAMA dinding luar rumah ini?
question.text: W14. What is the main material of the exterior walls in your household?

question.altText: W15. Apakah keluarga anda memiliki sepeda?
question.text: W15. Does your family have bicycle?

question.altText: W16. Apakah keluarga anda memiliki motor?
question.text: W16. Does your family have motorbike?

question.altText: W17. Apakah punya perahu dayung
question.text: W17. Does your family have rowboat?

question.altText: W18. Apakah punya kapal motor
question.text: W18. Does you family have motorboat?

question.altText: W19. Apakah keluarga anda memiliki kendaraan dengan tenaga hewan?
question.text: W19. Does you family have animal-driven based vehicle?

question.altText: W20. Apakah keluarga anda mempunyai mobil/truk?
question.text: W20. Does you family have car/truck?

question.altText: W21. Apakah keluarga anda memiliki kapal penangkap ikan?
question.text: W21. Does your family have fishing vessel?

question.altText: W22. Apakah keluarga anda punya lahan pertanian?
question.text: W22. Does your family have agricultural land?

question.altText: W23. Berapa hektar lahan yang dimiliki anggota keluarga ini?
question.text: W23. How many acres of agricultural land does your family have? (in hectare)

question.altText: W24. Apakah keluarga ini memiliki hewan ternak/kawanan ternak, peternakan, atau unggas?
question.text: W24. Does your household own any livestock, herds, other farm animals or poultry?

question.altText: W25. Berapa sapi ternak yang dimiliki?
question.text: W25. How many cow does your household own?

question.altText: W26. Berapa sapi perah yang dimiliki?
question.text: W26. How many milk cow or bulls does your household own?

question.altText: W27. Berapa kuda atau keledai yang dimiliki
question.text: W27. How many Horses, Donkey, or mules does your household own?

question.altText: W28. Berapa kambing/domba?
question.text: W28. How many Goats/sheep does your household own?

question.altText: W29. Berapa babi?
question.text: W29. How many Pig does your household own?

question.altText: W30. Berapa unggas?

help.text: IF NONE, ENTER '00'. IF 95 OR MORE, ENTER '95'.
help.altText: JIKA TIDAK ADA, TULIS "00" Jika 95 tulis "95". Jika tidak diketahui tulis "98"

question.text: W30. How many Poultry (Chicken, duck) does your household own?

question.altText: W31. Apakah keluarga ini mempunyai rekening bank/ikut koperasi atau tabungan lain?
question.text: W31. Does any member of your household have a Bank account/cooperative/ or other savings account?

question.altText: W32. Berapa orang tinggal di rumah ini?

help.text: Guidance: because the number of people living in the household has already been asked in HM12, refer to that question and answer the same number, together with the respondent
help.altText: Panduan: karena orang yang tinggal di rumah tangga sudah ditanyakan sebelumnya, tinggal merujuk ke pertanyaan tersebut dan jawabannya sama

question.text: W32. How many people live in your household

question.altText: W33. Apakah anda memiliki rumah sendiri atau rumah lain, baik milik sendiri atau milik bersama dengan orang lain?

help.text: Guidance: If the respondent is not the head of the household, then the question is whether the head of the household owns the house, or any other house, either alone or jointly with someone else.
help.altText: Panduan: Jika responden bukan kepala keluarga, maka pertanyaan

question.text: W33. Do you own your house or any other house either alone or jointly with someone else?

question.altText: SAN1. Apakah keluarga ini memiliki toilet?
question.text: SAN1. Do the members of your household have a toilet?

question.altText: SAN2. Apa jenis toiletnya? Bisa tunjukkan ke saya?

option.altText: Jamban cemplung dengan slab/papan yang menutup seluruh lubang(dudukan)

question.text: SAN2. What type is it? Can you please show it to me?

question.altText: SAN2A. Kemana tinja dibuang?

option.value: To the street, field or open pit
option.text: To the street, field or open pit
option.altText: Ke jalan, lapangan atau lubang terbuka

option.value: To the river or storm water drain
option.text: To the river or storm water drain

option.altText: Langsung ke lubang penampungan yang berada dibawah jamban/kloset
Ke lubang penampungan yang terpisah dengan toilet (off-set pit)
Ke lubang yang memiliki dua lubang alternatif (double (alternating) off-set pit
Ke dua lubang/kamar/bak tersambung (tidak kedap air)
Ke septik tank dua ruang yang kedap air

question.text: SAN2A. Where do the faeces go?

question.altText: SAN3. Apakah tinja bisa diakses/dijamah oleh tikus?
question.text: SAN3. Can rats reach the faeces in any way?

question.altText: SAN4. Berapa rumah tangga/keluarga yang menggunakan toilet ini?
question.text: SAN4. How many households use the toilet?

question.altText: SAN5. Apakah DUDUKAN TOILET atau TUTUP bisa menyebabkan LALAT keluar masuk lubang toilet? ( pengamatan)

help.text: Observe the construction of the toilet together with the respondent. Does the toilet pan or slab allow flies to go in and out of the pit?
help.altText: Amati konstruksi toilet bersama dengan responden

question.text: SAN5 .OBSERVE- Does the toilet pan or slab allow flies to go in and out of the pit?

question.altText: SAN5a. Apakah dudukan toilet bisa dibersihkan dan/atau dicuci?

help.text: Guidance: washable means with water; cleanable means with a broom and no water
help.altText: dicuci berarti menggunakan air; dibersihkan berarti menggunakan

option.altText: Ya, dibersihkan, tapi tidak bisa dicuci

question.text: SAN5A. Is the toilet slab washable and/or cleanable?

question.altText: SAN6. Apakah tangki/lubang berada diatas tanah?
question.text: SAN6 Is the tank/pit above the ground?

question.altText: SAN7. Berapa dalam lubang tersebut dari permukaan tanah? (meter)

help.text: If unsure – when the pit was being dug, was the pit deeper than the respondent? Enumerator to make as estimate of respondent’s height
help.altText: Kalau tidak yakin, ketika lubang tersebut digali, apakah lubang tersebut lebih dalam dari responden? Enumerator bisa melakukan estimasi berdasarkan tinggi responden

question.text: SAN7. How deep is the pit below the surface? (meters)

question.altText: SAN8. Apakah air tanah dapat KELUAR MASUK ke dalam lubang? (kedap air)

help.text: Guidance: a sealed pit has walls and floor which have been plastered to make it impermeable, for example with cement, so no content can seep out of the pit.
help.altText: Lubang kedap air memiliki dinding dan lantai yang diplester untuk membuat dia kedap air, contoh dengan semen, sehingga tidak ada tinja yang merembes keluar dari lubang.

question.text: SAN8. Can (ground) water get in or out of the pit? (‘water tight’)

question.altText: SAN9. Ketika lubang digali, apakah air tanah bisa merembes ke dalam?

help.text: Guidance: this question is to confirm whether the pit is located in an area with high ground water table, as also noted down in question HH8.
help.altText: Pertanyaan ini untuk memastikan apakah lubang ini berada di area dengan muka iar tanah tinggi, yang juga sudah tertulis pada pertanyaan HH8.

question.text: SAN9. When the pit was dug, was any ground water seeping in?

question.altText: SAN10. Apakah lubang toilet pernah bocor atau mengeluarkan air buangan dalam satu tahun? ( pertimbangkan juga kondisi musim hujan)

help.text: Guidance: question to find out whether pit contents can leak to surface water. To establish whether the toilet is environmentally safe.
help.altText: Pertanyaan ini untuk mengetahui apakah lubang tersebut bocor ke air permukaan. Untuk memastikan apakah toilet ini sudah aman bagi lingkungan.

question.text: SAN10. Does the pit or toilet leak /or overflow waste water at any time of the year? (CONSIDER RAINY SEASON TOO)

question.altText: SAN11. Berapa JARAK TOILET ke SUMBER AIR YANG YANG TERDEKAT YANG digunakan UNTUK MINUM

help.text: Guidance: So: is there a water source use for drinking? (Point water source as well as pond / river.) If yes, how far away is it, in metres, from the toilet of this household?
help.altText: Petunjuk: apakah disana ada sumber air yang digunakan untuk minum? ( sumber air bisa kolam atau sungai). Jika ya, berapa jaraknya dalam meter dari toilet.

question.text: SAN11. What is the distance to the nearest water source used for drinking?

question.altText: SAN12. Apakah sumber air tersebut berada diatas atau dibawah dari toilet
question.text: SAN12. Is that water source uphill or downhill from the toilet?

question.altText: SAN13. Apakah lubang toilet pernah di sedot?
question.text: SAN13. Has the pit ever been emptied?

question.altText: SAN14. Kapan terakhir kali LUBANG tersebut DISEDOT?
question.text: SAN14. When was it emptied into?

question.altText: SAN15. Siapakah yang melakukan PENYEDOTAN LUBANG tersebut?
question.text: SAN15. Who actually empties the pit?

question.altText: SAN16. Pada saat penyedotan, apakah seseorang harus masuk kedalam lubang toilet tersebut?

option.altText: Ya, dengan alat pelindung (sarung tangan+masker+sepatu boots)

question.text: SAN16. To empty the pit, did someone need to enter the pit.

question.altText: SAN17. Ditaruh/di buang kemana kotoran tinja yang sudah disedot?

option.value: Into a pit on the compound that is then covered
option.text: Into a pit on the compound that is then covered
option.altText: Ke lubang di area tersebut kemudian ditutup

option.value: Into a pit on the compound that is left open
option.text: Into a pit on the compound that is left open
option.altText: Ke lubang di area tersebut yang dibiarkan terbuka

option.value: Directly into drum/open container and taken away
option.text: Directly into drum/open container and taken away
option.altText: Langsung ke drum/wadah terbuka dan dibawa ketempat jauh

option.value: Directly into closed container/tanker and taken away
option.text: Directly into closed container/tanker and taken away
option.altText: Langsung ke tangki/wadah tertutup dan dibawa ke tempat jauh.

question.text: SAN17. What was it emptied into?

question.altText: USAN1. Apakah toilet digunakan sebagai toilet (tempat BAB)?

help.text: Guidance: what signs show that the toilet is being used as a toilet? Not locked, not extremely dry, presence of water in the toilet, no spider webs in the pan or across the toilet, a person can reasonably enter the toilet, there is a path leading to the toilet (the area around the toilet is not overgrown),…
help.altText: Panduan : apa yang menjadi tanda bahwa toilet yang digunakan adalah sebagai toilet ? Tidak terkunci, tidak kering, tersedia air, tidak terdapat sarang laba-laba, orang dapat dengan mudah masuk ke toilet, ada jalan yang mengarah ke toilet (daerah sekelilingnya tidak ditumbuhi tumbuhan yang menghalangi)

question.text: USAN1. Is the toilet in use, as a toilet?
New question - please change name

question.altText: USAN2. Apakah toilet berfungsi sesuai teknologi/konstruksinya ?

help.text: The question is whether the toilet is functioning as intended by the technology, not whether the respondent thinks it is fine as it is used now.
help.altText: Pertanyaannya adalah apakah toilet yang berfungsi seperti yang dimaksudkan sesuai dengan teknologinya, tidak hanya sesuai dengan pemikiran responden

question.text: USAN2. Is the toilet functioning as intended?

question.altText: USAN3. Apakah toilet berdinding dan berpintu ?

help.text: Guidance: with “in place” it is meant that the walls are standing, and the door can open and close. If the household doesn’t use any doors at all, it could also be another type of closure, e.g. curtain, screen,… The super structure should be in place and not see-through.
help.altText: Panduan : ini berarti ada dinding yang berdiri dan pintu yang dapat dibuka dan ditutup. Jika rumah tangga tidak memiliki pintu sama sekali, dapat juga menggunakan jenis lain untuk penutup seperti tirai atau gordin. Struktur dinding sehingga tidak dapat melihat ke bagian dalam toilet

question.text: USAN3. Are the walls and the door of the toilet in place?

question.altText: USAN4. Apakah toilet terbebas dari bau tinja pada dudukan, dinding dan lantainya ?
question.text: USAN4. Is the toilet free from faecal smears on pan, wall and floor?

question.altText: USAN5. Apakah toilet terbebas dari bahan pembersin (tissue, batu dan hal lainnya)
question.text: USAN5. Is the toilet pan free from used cleansing materials (paper, stones, sticks)?

question.altText: USAN6. Apa yang anda gunakan untuk cebok ?
question.text: USAN6. What do you use for anal cleansing?

question.altText: USAN7. Apakah anda menyiram toilet ?

option.value: No flush – pit latrine or other
option.text: No flush – pit latrine or other

question.text: USAN7. Do you flush the toilet?

question.altText: USAN8. Apakah air tersedia di toilet ? (untuk cebok dan menyiram)

dependency.answer-value: Yes, pour flush|Yes, full/ handle flush

help.text: Guidance: water might not be available always, and at the time of the interview, but brought to the toilet when it is used. That is also a Yes.
help.altText: Panduan : Air mungkin tidak tersedia setiap saat, begitu juga saat interview, tapi air dapat tersedia saat dibutuhkan dengan membawanya ke toilet. Maka ini jawabannya Ya.

question.text: USAN8. Is water available in the toilet? (for anal cleaning and flushing)

question.altText: USAN9. Bagaimana anda membuang tinja anak anda yang berumur kurang dari 3 tahun ?

help.text: If there's no children under 3 years old, choose the respective answer.

option.value: Pick up and deposit in the toilet
option.text: Pick up and deposit in the toilet
option.altText: Mengambil dan membuang di dalam toilet

option.value: Pick up and deposit in the garbage
option.text: Pick up and deposit in the garbage
option.altText: Mengambil dan membuang dalam tempat sampah

option.value: We have no household member under 3 years old
option.text: We have no household member under 3 years old

question.text: USAN9. How do you dispose off the stools of children under the age of 3 years old? (applicable only if there is children under 3 years old, please consult tooltip)

question.altText: USAN10. Apakah toilet anda ada PRIVASInya?
question.text: USAN10. Does the toilet provide privacy?

question.altText: USAN11-1. Apakah setiap anggota keluarga dapat menggunakan toilet dengan mudah dan nyaman serta tidak memerlukan pendampingan/bantuan ?
question.text: USAN11-1. Is everyone in the household presently able to use the toilet easily and conveniently, unassisted?

question.altText: USAN11.2. Jika tidak, mengapa
question.text: USAN11-2. If no, why

question.altText: USAN11A. Berapa banyak orang di dalam rumah yang tidak dapat menggunakan toilet karena berkebutuhan khusus ?
question.text: USAN11A. How many people in your household are unable to use the toilet because of special needs?

question.altText: USAN11B. Dalam rumah ini, apakah anggota keluarga berkebutuhan khusus didampingi untuk menggunakan toilet ?
question.text: USAN11B. In this household, are people with this special needs assisted in any way, to make use of the toilet

question.altText: USAN12. Apakah ada anggota keluarga yang mempunyai masalah saat menggunakan toilet ?

help.text: Guidance: This question and the next are to find out whether the technology of the toilet is appropriate.
help.altText: Panduan : Pertanyaan ini dan selanjutnya untuk menemukan teknologi toilet yang dibutuhkan

option.altText: Tidak tersedia air di dalam toilet
Ada serangga dan binatang dalam toilet

question.text: USAN12. Does anybody in the household have any problems using your toilet?

question.altText: USAN13. Apakah anda memiliki masalah dalam membersihkan dan memelihara toilet ?

option.value: Other users don’t know how to use
option.text: Other users don’t know how to use
option.altText: Pengguna lain tidak mengetahui cara menggunakannya

option.value: Other users don’t take their turn to clean
option.text: Other users don’t take their turn to clean
option.altText: Pengguna lain tidak bergilir untuk membersihkan

question.text: USAN13. Do you have any problems cleaning and maintaining your toilet?

question.altText: USAN14. Apa yang menjadi permasalahan utama dengan desainnya ?
question.text: USAN14. What is the main problem with the design?

question.altText: HW1. Sebutkan kapan saja waktu anda mencuci tangan?

help.text: This is a knowledge question. Guidance: do not read out the options, let respondent say when.
help.altText: Opsi tidak perlu dibaca, biarkan responden menjawab sendiri kapan mereka mencuci tangan.

option.value: Before breast feeding or feeding a child
option.text: Before breast feeding or feeding a child
option.altText: Sebelum menyusui atau memberi makan bayi

option.value: After cleaning a child that has defecated/ changing child's nappy
option.text: After cleaning a child that has defecated/ changing child's nappy
option.altText: Setelah menceboki anak/ mengganti popok bayi

question.text: HW1. Please mention all the occasions when it is important to wash your hands?

question.altText: HW2. Apakah ada TEMPAT CUCI TANGAN berjarak dalam 10 LANGKAH dari TOILET?

help.text: The main interest is to know about accessible distance. 10 steps or paces.
help.altText: perhatian utama adalah untuk mengetahui jarak akses. 10 langkah atau lebih

question.text: HW2. Is there a place for hand washing within 10 steps from the toilet?

question.altText: HW3. Apakah air tersedia di tempat cuci tangan, sekarang?

help.text: Guidance: “water is available” can also be ticked if the device doesn’t have water but is still wet.
help.altText: Buktikan dengan memeriksa keran/pompa, ember, wadah air atau wadah yang menujukkan keberadaan air

question.text: HW3. Is there water available at the specific place for hand washing, now?
New question - please change name

question.altText: Apakah ada sabun atau pengganti sabun yang tersedia pada fasilitas cuci tangan sekarang?
question.text: HW4. Is there soap or a soap substitute available at the specific place for hand washing, now?

question.altText: HW5. Apakah tempat cuci tangan mencegah kontaminasi dari air ke tangan?

help.text: Guidance: Only water from a tap or flowing device such as for example a tippy-tap (connected to running water or container with a lid) prevents contamination of water by hands.
help.altText: Hanya air dari keran atau tempat air yang mengalir seperti contoh tippy-tap yang mencegah kontaminasi air dengan tangan

question.text: HW5. Does the hand washing station prevent contamination of the water by hands?

question.altText: HW6. Apakah air mengalir dari keran?
question.text: HW6. Is there running water from a tap?

question.altText: HW7. apakah ada TEMPAT CUCI TANGAN dalam JARAK 10 LANGKAH dari tempat menyiapkan makanan?

help.text: Guidance: The main interest is to know about accessible distance
help.altText: perhatian utama untuk mengetahui jarak akses.

question.text: HW7. Is there a place for hand washing within 10 steps from where food is prepared?

question.altText: HW8. Apakah air tersedia untuk cuci tangan sekarang?

help.text: Guidance: “water is available” can also be ticked if the device doesn’t have water but is still wet.
help.altText: Buktikan dengan memeriksa keran/pompa, ember, wadah air atau wadah yang menujukkan keberadaan air

question.text: HW8. Is there water available at the specific place for hand washing, now?

question.altText: HW9. Apakah ada sabun atau pengganti sabun tersedia untuk cuci tangan, sekarang?
question.text: HW9. Is there soap or a soap substitute available at the specific place for hand washing, now?

question.altText: HW10. Adakah tempat cuci tangan yang mencegah kontaminasi air dengan tangan?

help.text: Guidance: Only water from a tap or flowing device such as for example a tippy-tap (connected to running water or container with a lid) prevents contamination of water by hands.
help.altText: Hanya air dari keran atau tempat air yang mengalir seperti contoh tippy-tap yang mencegah kontaminasi air dengan tangan

question.text: HW10. Does the hand washing station prevent contamination of the water by hands?

question.altText: HW11. Apakah air mengalir dari keran?
question.text: HW11. Is there running water from a tap?

question.altText: HW12. Apakah pernah melihat/mendengar promosi tentang praktek cuci tangan yang baik dalam 12 bulan terakhir? dari sumber mana atau media apa?

help.text: Guidance: More than one answer can apply, so more than one answer can be filled in/ticked.
help.altText: Jawaban bisa lebih dari satu

question.text: HW12. Have you seen / heard any promotion on good hand washing practice in the last 12 months? Through which source or media?

question.altText: HW12A. Jika ya, bisa dijelaskan sumber/media apa?

option.value: Yes from a health visitor / community worker
option.text: Yes from a health visitor / community worker
option.altText: Ya, dari penyuluh kesehatan yang datang/pekerja di masyarakat

question.text: HW12A. If yes, please specify which source / media?

question.altText: HW13. Lembaga mana/siapa yang mengorganisir kegiatan tersebut?

option.value: SNV (or one of our partners in this programme)
option.text: SNV (or one of our partners in this programme)
option.altText: SNV ( atau salah satu mitra di program ini)

question.text: HW13. Which organisation organised it?

question.altText: Pengamatan Supervisor
question.text: Supervisor’s Observations

question.altText: Pengamatan Enumerator
question.text: Interviewer’s Observations

question.altText: HH13-1. Foto toilet bagian depan/luar
question.text: HH13-1. Toilet photo from FRONT/OUTSIDE

question.altText: HH13-2. Foto toilet bagian dalam
question.text: HH13-2. Toilet photo from INSIDE

question.altText: HH13-3. Foto toilet dari bagian belakang
question.text: HH13-3. Toilet photo from BEHIND/BACK SIDE

question.altText: HH13-4. Tempat cuci tangan setelah buang air besar
question.text: HH13-4. Hand washing place after defecation

question.altText: HH13-5. (jika tidak sama dengan pertanyaan HH13-4) Foto tempat cuci tangan sebelum makan
question.text: HH13-5. (if not the same with question HH13-4) Hand washing place before eating.

question.altText: Lokasi GPS
question.text: GPS location
